title: Climate Change's Effects Outpacing Ability to Adapt, I.P.C.C. Warns
content:
1. Climate Change's Effects Outpacing Ability to Adapt, I.P.C.C. Warns  The New York Times
  2. 'Delay means death': We're running out of ways to adapt to the climate crisis, new report shows. Here are the key takeaways  CNN
  3. UN climate report: 'Atlas of human suffering' worse, bigger  Associated Press
  4. UN panel's grim climate change report: 'Parts of the planet will become uninhabitable'  USA TODAY
  5. ‘Fossil fuels are choking humanity’: Major UN report sounds the alarm on climate impacts  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 気候変動の影響は適応能力を上回る、I.P.C.C.は警告する
I.P.C.C.警告说，气候变化的影响超过了适应能力。
I.P.C.C.警告說，氣候變化的影響超過了適應能力。
